Guanqun Yang

Master Student in UCLA ECE Department
 

My name is Guanqun Yang (杨冠群), and I am a master student in Electrical and Computer Engineering at UCLA.

My research interest is statistical machine learning and its applications. I was advised by Prof. Yunzhou Zhang and used to be working on pose estimation of mobile robots. I received my Bachelor's degree in Automatic Control from Northeastern University, China in 2017.

Currently I am actively looking for research opportunities in related areas. My CV could be found here.

Recent Activities

  • [12/25/2018] I migrate and optimize my previous notes and host them on Read the Docs, the world's largest open-source documentation hosting service (previously my notes were on GitBook). This effort is the best Christmas gift for me since my notes finally find their home!

  • [12/12/2018] I present my work in fairness-preserving machine learning. Check out my presentation slide here.
